thread.title: Another Great Stay!!
thread.title_full: Another Great Stay!! - Review of Fairfield Inn & Suites New York Queens/Queensboro Bridge, Long Island City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: mhn14
title: Another Great Stay!!
text: I've stayed at this hotel several times over the last couple of years, I guess I've become a regular! I arrived early Wednesday morning and Brandy who works the overnight shift greeted and told me she was expecting me. Since I was extremely tired this was music to my ears, she checked me in quickly and since a high floor (my preference) wasn't available she upgraded me to a King Suite. I was a little concerned since the suite was on the second floor but you know what I didn't hear much noise from the street at all. I was working evenings in Manhattan so when I returned late at night Brandy was there to greet me and ask if everything was okay. I highly recommend this hotel it is convenient to Manhattan and at a Queens price which is a really good value.
